1.「おおっ <pc>！| よく来てくれた！: Whoa!<pc> Thank you! Thank God you're here!

2.「そ…村王が こんな手紙を残して| いなくなってしまったのだ。| 読むから そこ: So... The King of the village left this|letter... I'll read it, but I need you to|stay there and listen...

3.「……ギュランよ。| お前を わしの側近としてから| もう １０年あまりの時が過: ... Gyu... It's been more than ten years|since I took you into my entourage...

4.「お前に ひとつ頼みたいことがある。| これから お前には ランガーオ村の| 子: I have one favor to ask of you... From now|on, I want you to build a school for the|children of Langao...

5.「わしは こう思うのだ。| ランガーオ村の若者たちが この村だけで| 生涯を終え: I think... The days when the young men of|Langao would live out their lives in this|village alone are over. ....

6.「ジーガンフや アロルドとマイユ| そして <pc>のように 前途ある若者が|: Zieganff, Arold and Mayle| and<pc> It's a time when promising young people like|you, like me, aim for greatness by traveling|the world.

7.「だが 若者たちが 見果てぬ世界に旅立つ時| この村のことしか知らずにいたら 困: But I don't want these young men to go off|into the unknown knowing nothing but this|village. I don't want that to happen to them.

8.「お前が 子供たちに この世界の| 様々なことを 教えてやってほしいのだ。: I want you to teach our children about the|many things in this world...

9.「この村で いちばんアタマのいい お前が| <pc>たちからの協力を得れば| 必: You're the smartest person in this village|<pc> I'm sure with the help of the others, we can|make this happen.

10.「とても時間が かかることだろう。| だが わしからの 最後の頼みだ。| どうか: It's going to take a long time. But it's my|last... Please hear me...

11.「……手紙は ここで終わっている。| これは 村王の……遺書ということか……。: ... The letter ends here... "This is the will|of the village king... A suicide note...

12.「手紙には 行方は書かれていないが| とにかく 村王を 探さなくては！| <pc: The letter doesn't say where he is, but we|have to find the Village King!<pc> No! I need you to find the village king!

13.「すまぬ <pc>！ 恩に着るぞ！: I'm sorry<pc> I owe you! I'm in your debt!

14.「ただ やみくもに 走り回るよりも| 村王が どこに行ったかの情報を| 探す方が: But instead of running around blindly, we'd|better find out where the Village King has|gone!

15.「こちらも 手を尽くす。| <pc>も まずは情報集めに| 全力を 注いでくれ！: This one too...<pc> I want you to do everything you can to gather|information.

16.「やってくれるか……。| しかし どうやら 今は 頼まれごとで| 手いっぱいのよ: Will you do it? But apparently you have your|hands full with favors right now...

17.「取りかえしが つかないことになる前に| 一刻も早く 手を空けてきてくれ！: I need you to get your hands free as soon as|possible, before there's nothing I can do to|get them back!

19.「だが 村王を探してくれる気になったら| ここに来てくれ。頼むぞ。: But if you feel like looking for the Village|King, come here: ......

20.「おおっ <pc>！| また来てくれたということは| 頼みを 聞いてくれるのだな: Whoa!<pc> Oh! If you're here again, you'll do me a|favor, won't you?

23.「……ギュランよ。| お前を わしの側近としてから| もう １０年あまりの時が過: ... Gyu... It's been more than ten years|since I took you into my entourage...

24.「お前に ひとつ頼みたいことがある。| これから お前には ランガーオ村の| 子: I have one favor to ask of you... From now|on, I want you to build a school for the|children of Langao...

25.「わしは こう思うのだ。| ランガーオ村の若者たちが この村だけで| 生涯を終え: I think... The days when the young men of|Langao would live out their lives in this|village alone are over. ....

26.「ジーガンフや アロルドとマイユ| そして <pc>のように 前途ある若者が|: Zieganff, Arold and Mayle| and<pc> It's a time when promising young people like|you, like me, aim for greatness by traveling|the world.

27.「だが 若者たちが 見果てぬ世界に旅立つ時| この村のことしか知らずにいたら 困: But I don't want these young men to go off|into the unknown knowing nothing but this|village. I don't want that to happen to them.

28.「お前が 子供たちに この世界の| 様々なことを 教えてやってほしいのだ。: I want you to teach our children about the|many things in this world...

29.「この村で いちばんアタマのいい お前が| <pc>たちからの協力を得れば| 必: You're the smartest person in this village|<pc> I'm sure with the help of the others, we can|make this happen.

30.「とても時間が かかることだろう。| だが わしからの 最後の頼みだ。| どうか: It's going to take a long time. But it's my|last... Please hear me...

32.「手紙には 行方は書かれていない。| <pc>よ。とにかく 村王を| 見つけだし: The letter didn't say where he was...<pc> Okay. Anyway, let's find the Village King|and... Will you do it?

34.「その様子だと どうやら| 何も わからないようだな……。: By the looks of it, you don't seem to know|what you're talking about.

35.「とにかく 手遅れになる前に 急いで| 村王を 探しだしてくれ。まずは 村人たち: Anyway, before it's too late, we should hurry|and find the village king. First, we need to|get some sightings from the villagers.

37.「おや？ あなたも 旅の方のようですな。| アッシも 世界を旅しながら めずらし: Hmm? You seem to be a traveler... I'm a|traveling merchant who travels the world to|buy rare things...

38.「……むむっ？ ワケありな様子でござんすね。| ほうほう……。村王クリフゲーンさ: ... Mmm? There's something going on here...|Oh... I was wondering if you'd seen the|Village King, Mr. Cliff Gaines, anywhere?

39.「村王なら この村に来る道中に| おかしな場所で 見かけたでござんすよ。: If you're the Village King, you must have|seen him in some strange places on your way|to this village...

40.「あれは たしか…… 獅子門から| グレン領東に抜けた辺り……村王は| そこから: I think that's... From the Lion's Gate to the|east of the Glenn territory... The Village|King went west from there...

41.「なんだか 顔色が悪かったんで| 妙に 気がかりだったんでござんすよ。: You were looking a little pale, so I was|wondering why...

42.「では アッシは 先を急ぎますんで| 失礼いたしやすよ。: Well, I'm in a hurry, so if you'll excuse|me...

44.「……なに？ 旅の商人が グレン領東で| 村王を見かけたという 情報があった？: ... What? Did a traveling merchant report|seeing the Village King in eastern Glenn|territory?

45.「村王が グレン領東に行くなどという話は| 聞いていない……。それは 有力な情報: I've heard no mention of the Village King|going east of the Glenn... That's promising|information...

46.「よし！ そういうことなら| 急いで グレン領東に行き 村王を探してくれ！| <: All right! If that's the case, hurry to the|east of the Glenn territory and find the|village king!<pc> Come on, man!

47.「あの ガガベスの 忘れ形見……。| さぞ強くなっただろうと 思ってはいたが|: The last remnant of Gaga Beth... I thought|you'd be strong, but I never thought you'd be|this strong.

48.「今の お前ならば……| ジーガンフや アロルドにさえ| 勝てるかもしれん……。: If you can do it now... You might even be|able to defeat Zeganov and Arold...

49.「自ら 戦いを挑みにきた その勇気には| 価値があると 認めてやろう。: You've come to fight your own battle, and|you've earned the courage to do so.

50.「だが 相手の実力と おのれの実力を| 推し量る能力まで 失ったとあっては| た: But if you've lost the ability to assess your|opponent's strength and your own, then you're|just a worn-out old...

51.「……老いるということは みじめなことだな。| クリフゲーン。: ... Aging is a miserable thing... Clif...

53.「どうやら わしに 勝ち目はないようだ……。| さあ とどめを刺せ……！| 今こ: It looks like I don't stand a chance. Now,|finish him off. It's time to avenge your|father's death.

54.「だが…… 最後に ひとつだけ| わしの願いを 聞いてくれぬか……。: But... But if you'll do me one last favor...

56.「ガガイよ……。| ランガーオ村に 戻るのだ……。: Gagai... You must return to the village of|Langao...

57.「お前は 強い……。| あの村は 強き者を 尊敬で迎える。| きっと お前は 歓: You are strong. The village respects the|strong. I'm sure you'll be welcomed with open|arms.

58.「ガガベスに勝った あの日に……| お前を 復讐の鬼にしてしまったのなら| わし: The day I defeated Gandalf... If I've turned|you into a vengeful demon, I want to give you|back your future...

59.「故郷 ランガーオ村で生きよ。| わしは 誰にも伝えず ここに来た。| お前が: In my home village of Langao... I'm here to|tell no one... No one knows you defeated me.

60.「貴様に このオレの気持ちを知ることなど| できるはずがないのだ……。: You have no way of knowing how I feel...

61.「残念だが お前に とどめは刺さん。: I'm sorry, but I can't let you...

63.「オレの目的は お前を殺すことだけではない。: My only goal is to kill you.

64.「身体が動くようになったら| 村に戻って こう伝えろ。| 死神が この村を 滅ぼ: When you are able to move, you will return to|the village and say... The Grim Reaper will|come to destroy this village. .....

65.「死神から逃げるか 立ち向かうかは| お前たち次第だ。だが いずれにせよ| ラン: You can run from the Reaper or you can fight|him... But either way, the village of Langao|will be destroyed...

67.「あの 腐った村を 壊滅させなくては| オレが この世に生を受けた 意味がない。: If I don't destroy that rotten village, it's|the reason I came into this world...

68.「そして クリフゲーンよ。貴様には| あの村が滅びる様を 見届ける義務がある。|: And you, Cliffe... You're going to have to|watch that village die. I thought it would be|easy for you to die.

70.「そうか ギュランに頼まれて| わしを探しにきてくれたのか……。: So, you've come looking for me at the behest|of Durand...

71.「あれが ガガベスの息子 ガガイ……。| 若き日の わしが生んでしまった| 復讐: That's Gaga-Beth's son, Gaga... The avenging|demon I created in my youth.

72.「戦ってみて 確信した……。| 今の ガガイの強さならば 本当に| たったひとり: When I fought him, I was convinced... With|Gagai's current strength, he could really|destroy a village all by himself...

73.「ジーガンフも アロルドも| 村にいない今 ガガイを 止める術がない。| いった: Now that Zigandoff and Arrold are out of the|village, there's nothing we can do to stop|Gagai. I don't know what to do.

74.「とにかく 一度 村に戻ろう……。| わしなら大丈夫だ。ひとりで 戻れる……。: Anyway, let's just go back to the village. I|can do it... I can go back alone.

75.「<pc>も 村に戻ったら| わしの所へ 来てくれ……。: <pc> When you return to the village, come to me.
